title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve
title_original: Women's Oversized Roll Neck Sweater Long Sleeve Chunky Knit Pullover Cozy Fall Winter Tops Casual Loose Knitwear

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfection!
items.body: This is an EXACT JCrew dupe!! I was obsessed with this sweater when it dropped on JCrew, but it was $148 and sold out almost immediately. I’ve been searching for a resell or a dupe, and I took a risk on this one (no reviews, ships oversees). Risk well played! I can confidently say that I will purchase from this seller again and am VERY happy with this sweater! I’m 5’8”, 230lbs, double D chest, and ordered a large. The large is nice and roomy and looks oversized tucked in or out. Read more
items.author: Sam Barbour

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great JCREW Dupe
items.body: I got pink and it’s a little sheer but other than that, I love it! Great dupe for the jcrew one! It isn’t as thick but I had gotten lots of compliments on it! Read more
items.author: CADENCE KING

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Doop
items.body: Love this and the price!!! Don’t hesitate to buy! Fits TTS! Read more
items.author: cc2412

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love!
items.body: Obsessed!!! This is a J Crew roll neck dupe, originally over $100+ online and found this for over half the price! Took about 2 weeks to arrive but literally looks to exact same to me! Got a size large for oversize look. I’m 136 lbs 5’7! Maybe a tad itchy but haven’t washed it yet. Probably wouldn’t wash in hot water and would air dry it. Read more
items.author: Melissa and Erik Eckblad

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality sweater for fall or winter
items.body: This is a lovely sweater. It is quality made and a great color. It is accurate to the description and photos. It falls on the smaller size versus oversized so if you're wanting it a little bigger, I would recommend sizing up. It is a thick, knit material. A perfect sweater for fall or winter. Read more
items.author: Adriana

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Soft, cozy, lovely color
items.body: This sweater is SUPER soft. I like the collar, pops up and looks chic, without the restriction of a full turtleneck. The color is a perfect ivory, not too yellow. It general I find the fit a bit too oversized and boxy for me, I’m 5’7” and 135, just not super flattering on me. Read more
items.author: yls

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Preppy striped sweater
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Great preppy sweater for a fraction of the name brand price. Fits true to size. Jas some synthetic yarn. Would order again! Read more
items.author: Sharron Vogler

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect basic
items.body: Perfect basic sweater to go with everything! This is the grab and go sweater that still looks polished even if you threw it on because you’re running late and your hair is in a messy bun. This sweater makes you look presentable. Plus, it goes with anything! Jeans, skirts, leggings, cargo pants, dress pants—everything! Read more
items.author: KB BK

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Navy, Pink, Ivory, Burgundy-navy, Brown-ivory, Pink-brown, Ivory-ruby-black, Grey, Navy-multi-stripe. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
